title: Bontrager Aeolus Pro 37V wheelset review: Recyclable carbon goes allroad
content:
The Aeolus Pro 37V works well for both road and gravel, but their recyclable carbon construction is a novel and worthwhile change.

Read the full article at Bontrager Aeolus Pro 37V wheelset review: Recyclable carbon goes allroad on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
